top.title: US justice department accused of withholding Trump-related Epstein files
top.summary: The top Democrat on the congressional panel investigating Epstein has called on the attorney general to publish the material.

top.title: US and Iran hold talks seen as crucial to prevent conflict
top.summary: The indirect negotiations in Geneva are seen as a last-ditch effort, but the chances of a nuclear agreement are unclear.

top.title: Russia says it has handed over 1,000 Ukrainian soldiers' bodies
top.summary: Russia's announcement comes as Ukraine's top negotiator was meeting US peace envoys in Geneva.

top.title: Instagram to alert parents if teens search for self-harm and suicide content
top.summary: Meta says it will help parents support their children - but safety campaigners have accused them of "passing the buck".

top.title: Chip giant Nvidia defies AI concerns with record $215bn revenue
top.summary: Demand for Nvidia chips rose even as the company sets out to create AI products of its own.

top.title: Not even potholes will hold up self-driving cars, UK firm predicts
top.summary: Wayve says it's confident all cars will one day be autonomous, as it announced more than a £1bn in additional investment.

title.#text: Burger King will use AI to check if employees say ‘please’ and ‘thank you’
The smart lock standard that could replace your keys is finally here
Instagram will alert parents if their kids ‘repeatedly’ search for self-harm topics
